channel.title: General Discussion
channel.description: General Discussion of the Decimation Mod

item.title: Furniture, Basing, Crafting and Farming. More suggestions for Decimation.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Electricdarkness)
item.dc:creator: Electricdarkness
item.content:encoded:
Furniture
There should be lootable furniture in the house like kitchen cabinets, refrigerators and drawers. These would have things like kitchen knives, crackers, canned food, chips, drinks and rotting food.
.Living Room furniture like .
-different colored couches
-cushioned chairs different colors
-coffee tables
-night stands
-tall and short lamps.
.Bedroom Furniture like
-more realistic beds different colors
-curtains
-floor rugs
.Bathroom...

Furniture, Basing, Crafting and Farming. More suggestions for Decimation.

item.title: Recommendation for Decimation's future updates.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Electricdarkness)
item.dc:creator: Electricdarkness
item.content:encoded:
What I would like to see added to Decimation
One thing I would really like to see added to Decimation is a more so survival factor over the killing everybody factor. This would mean making some sort of way to have an extremely large map that could be modified to certain points. This would also mean adding several things that Decimation is currently lacking. Such as detailed cars, a more complex crafting system, farming etc. ...

Recommendation for Decimation's future updates.

item.title: NPC Factions
item.author: invalid@example.com (VeteranPug)
item.dc:creator: VeteranPug
item.content:encoded:
I believe that we should have the factions of Hero's and Bandit's added to the whole scheme of decimation because of how we can provide more incite to how we the people of this game should be able to play it how they want it, you wanna be a hero and save others in the wastelands you can be like that, or if your savage bandit looking to kill all survivors you can do this as well. That is why we should introduce the idea of being part of N.P.C factions considering...

NPC Factions

item.title: problem with the upgrade
item.author: invalid@example.com (_CabbKing_)
item.dc:creator: _CabbKing_
item.content:encoded:
I had just downloaded the mod and I had opened minecraft but I could not play because I had to update the mod and then I updated it. Once I do this shut down minecraft, as expected, I reopened it and it was written "play" I tried to enter the server in New York but came out the anticheat that said that there were other mods in the folder of mods. I went to check and saw that after the update was inserted another .jar file in the mod folder: "decimationvoicechat.jar" I removed and closed...

problem with the upgrade

item.title: Problems occur after update
item.author: invalid@example.com (IcedxOtaku)
item.dc:creator: IcedxOtaku
item.content:encoded:
Decimation on my Technic Launcher stopped working after I started the updates that came out today. When I clicked update, it continues to load slowly than stops and stays at 82% for almost 2 hours. I had no choice but to close my Minecraft and reinstall hoping it would fix it. Sadly, when I went to reinstall it, a pop-up came saying It failed to download and I needed to contact modpack author. Any ideas on how to fix it or will there be another update that will fix this problem? It’s...

Problems occur after update

item.title: VEHICLES & GUNS
item.author: invalid@example.com (Deathly)
item.dc:creator: Deathly
item.content:encoded:
Dear Community,

I want to suggest some nice ideas which i have thought over, that should probably get added to make Decimation more realistic and increase the fun factor.

Lets begin with the
Vehicles:

1) Humvee: 5 Seater, mounted .50 Cal MG (my favorite Vehicle for the ground), add trunk storage, so its getting possible to make a mobile base or supporting a clan with supplies
2) AH-64D „Apache Longbow“: 2 Seater, AGM Hellfires, Hydra 70 and maybe some MG's, make it so that the Pilot is...

VEHICLES & GUNS

item.title: Topic:Snipers in-game
item.author: invalid@example.com (VeteranPug)
item.dc:creator: VeteranPug
item.content:encoded:
I think snipers should be in the game because they could be used by everyone, right now you could only access them in single-player which doesn't really do anything to benefit the game. So the snipers we have right now like the L115a3 (AWM) and the Snaiperskaya Vintoka (SV98) should only be found in supply drops and have a 25% drop rate so it's by chance you get one of these things. Pros and normal players can benefit from this, another idea is that snipers like a mosin...

Topic:Snipers in-game

item.title: [ADD OPTIFINE SUPPORT] Lag too much on the Spawn, Please?
item.author: invalid@example.com (LimTheLime)
item.dc:creator: LimTheLime
item.content:encoded:
Hello,

Please add Optifine Support on the Modpack, Most Players doesnt have a "BEASTLY" Computers/Laptops. its lagging too much for Client's Side, it would be amazing if you can make support Optifine only, im only asking for that particular mod no other mods, just that, so it can make player play the game smoothly even tho they have a low end pc.

Thank you and please look into this Suggestion , its for the better of the mankind. \(^-^)/

item.title: i got banned for no reason while playing =(
item.author: invalid@example.com (creeperswag123)
item.dc:creator: creeperswag123
item.content:encoded:
hey team, i was playing decimation after i got home from school and then suddenly it popped up with a message saying ive been globally banned from decimation, i wasnt doing anything wrong i was using the decimation modpack (downloaded from twitch) i had been playing for about the past 2-3 days and i love it, im really sad that ive been banned and am asking to be unbanned?
thanks creeper

item.title: Ideas

item.dc:creator: Traxx_
item.content:encoded:
Hi Guys,

I've got some ideas :
Guns:

-add Scar-L and Scar-H
-add AK 47
-add Mini 14
-add SKS
-add Glock 18

Vehicles:

-better driving:
•The car rolls out when you no longer press „W"
•steer better
-add Buggy
-add suv
-add Boats
-add motorcycle

Other things:

-add more scopes (ACOG,holographic sight, 6x scope...)
-add medkit
-add adrenaline syringe

I hope I could help you with my ideas!
Yours Traxx_

your Traxx_

item.title: Previous Donation
item.author: invalid@example.com (Matthias)
item.dc:creator: Matthias
item.content:encoded:
Hello McDecimation,

I used to play on the old mod pack and server. I played on it for a few years and grew quite fond of the game. I decided to donate and buy a rank in game to hopefully make the game more fun. I was wondering if any of the perks I bought will be carried over into this new mod pack. I would understand if it didn't but it would be nice if you could work some sort of compensation for my previous purchase.

Thank you.
